Sentencas: This work investigates numerically a catalytic postcombustor for a micro-solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The postcombustor oxidizes toxic and explosive carbon monoxide (CO) and hydrogen exiting a solid oxide fuel cell to carbon dioxide and water.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: A single 1 mm diameter monolith reactor channel coated with platinum catalyst is modeled in this work.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The inlet stream composition is provided by a semi-analytical 2D model of a detailed SOFC system.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The model of the postcombustor includes the 2D axisymmetric Navier-Stokes equations, heat conduction in the channel wall, and a multistep finite-rate mechanism for the surface reactions.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: It is shown that under the operation conditions considered, the influence of homogeneous (gas phase) reactions can be neglected.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The model predicts the expected adiabatic temperatures at the postcombustor outlet correctly and can be used for dimensioning and optimization.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Postcombustor performance varies significantly with the choice of the operating parameters of the fuel cell.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The most critical molecule at the SOFC outlet is shown to be CO because its depletion is slower than that of H-2 for the entire operating range of the SOFC.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: It can be shown that the postcombustor is able to reduce the level of CO below the toxicity threshold of 25 ppm.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Although higher voltages of the fuel cell lead to faster CO conversion in the postcombustor, they also result in a significant increase in wall temperature of the catalyst device.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Furthermore, the percentage of SOFC power output used for pump work is lowest for the voltage where the maximum power is reached.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: For postcombustion the optimal operation point of the SOFC is at the voltage for maximum power of the SOFC system.
Titulo: Simulation of the Postcombustor for the Treatment of Toxic and Flammable Exhaust Gases of a Micro-Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
